SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
NONPROFIT CLOUD
Program Management

Increase productivity, eliminate data silos, and be empowered to make timely decisions by managing and delivering your programs with Program Management.

Get Started with Program and Case Management
Use Program Management to increase productivity, eliminate data silos, and empower staff who manage and deliver programs to make timely decisions. Enable Case Management to equip your team with tools for intake, assessments, and guided care plans. Explore a trial org and learn about what's included, the recommended setup, and how to get ready for your implementation.
Discover and Explore
See how Program Management supports nonprofit organizations to manage and deliver their programs.
Set Up Program Management
Enable settings and assign permission sets to get started using Program Management.
Programs and Benefits
Create programs to track and manage nonprofit initiatives and deliver benefits to your participants efficiently.
Benefit Schedules and Benefit Participants
Streamline benefit delivery by creating a benefit schedule and adding participants to it.
Attendance and Benefit Disbursement Tracking
Track attendance and actual units of benefit quantity delivered to participants per benefit session. Also, track ad hoc disbursements that include disbursements for recipients who received a benefit without enrolling for it, and also for recipients who availed a benefit that doesn't have a schedule or session associated with it.
Review and Report on Programs and Benefits
Review the easy-to-access quick reporting numbers, such as the count of all program participants, total active program participants, and total disbursed quantity for a benefit. With Actionable Relationship Center (ARC), review your object relationships in an easy-to-navigate graph. Generate reports to get an up-to-date view of your programs and benefits, such as the quantity of benefits delivered for all benefits across all programs, count of active program participants.
Manage Programs for Case Participants
Enroll case participants to programs and enable them to receive benefits and improve their well-being.
Program Management Implementation Examples
Review these examples to learn how to achieve value with Program Management and apply the learning for your own program needs.
